```{r setup, include = FALSE}

knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

#===============================================================================
# Figure and table numbering
#===============================================================================

figure_nums <- captioner::captioner(prefix = "**Figure ")
table_nums <- captioner::captioner(prefix = "**Table ")

#===============================================================================
# Formating of headers parsed in cat(sprintf())
#===============================================================================

header1 <- '# %s'
header2 <- '## %s'
header3 <- '### %s'
header4 <- '#### %s'

#===============================================================================
# Function for making first letter upper case
#===============================================================================

firstup <- function(x) {
  substr(x, 1, 1) <- toupper(substr(x, 1, 1))
  x
}

#===============================================================================
# Load data
#===============================================================================

load(file = paste0(directories$dir_dat_deriv, "/scenarios_inputs_results.Rdata"))
load(file = paste0(directories$dir_dat_deriv, "/scenarios_model.Rdata"))
load(file = paste0(directories$dir_dat_deriv, "/scenarios_patients.Rdata"))

```



```{r Comparison, echo=FALSE}

color_brew <- colorRampPalette(brewer.pal(4, "Set1") )(4)

#===============================================================================
# ETRANACOGENE
#===============================================================================

#-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
# Costs and QALYs
#-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

ggplot(scen_analysis$ETRANACOGENE_relative_bleed_reduction$model_results, aes(x = ETRANACOGENE_QALYs_disc , y = ETRANACOGENE_cost_disc/1000000)) +
  geom_point()+
  geom_text(aes(label=ETRANACOGENE_relative_bleed_reduction), nudge_x = 0.1, nudge_y = 0.1, check_overlap = TRUE, col = "red") + 
  geom_hline(yintercept = 0) +
  geom_vline(xintercept = 0) +
  ylab("Costs [Mio. EUR]") + xlab("QALYs") +
  settings$ggplot_theme

ggplot(scen_analysis$ETRANACOGENE_max_bleed_reduction_duration$model_results, aes(x = ETRANACOGENE_QALYs_disc , y = ETRANACOGENE_cost_disc/1000000)) +
  geom_point()+
  geom_text(aes(label=ETRANACOGENE_max_bleed_reduction_duration), nudge_x = 0.1, nudge_y = 0.1, check_overlap = TRUE, col = "red") + 
  geom_hline(yintercept = 0) +
  geom_vline(xintercept = 0) +
  ylab("Costs [Mio. EUR]") + xlab("QALYs") +
  settings$ggplot_theme

ggplot(scen_analysis$ETRANACOGENE_bleed_increase_per_year$model_results, aes(x = ETRANACOGENE_QALYs_disc , y = ETRANACOGENE_cost_disc/1000000)) +
  geom_point()+
  geom_text(aes(label=ETRANACOGENE_bleed_increase_per_year), nudge_x = 0.1, nudge_y = 0.1, check_overlap = TRUE, col = "red") + 
  geom_hline(yintercept = 0) +
  geom_vline(xintercept = 0) +
  ylab("Costs [Mio. EUR]") + xlab("QALYs") +
  settings$ggplot_theme

ggplot(scen_analysis$ETRANACOGENE_success_prob$model_results, aes(x = ETRANACOGENE_QALYs_disc , y = ETRANACOGENE_cost_disc/1000000)) +
  geom_point()+
  geom_text(aes(label=ETRANACOGENE_success_prob), nudge_x = 0.2, nudge_y = 0.1, check_overlap = TRUE, col = "red") + 
  geom_hline(yintercept = 0) +
  geom_vline(xintercept = 0) +
  ylab("Costs [Mio. EUR]") + xlab("QALYs") +
  settings$ggplot_theme

#-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
# Comparisons with Prophylaxis
#-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

ggplot(scen_analysis$ETRANACOGENE_relative_bleed_reduction$model_results, aes(x = ETRANACOGENE_PROPHYLAXIS_inc_QALY , y = ETRANACOGENE_PROPHYLAXIS_inc_Costs/1000000)) +
  geom_point()+
  geom_text_repel(aes(label=ETRANACOGENE_relative_bleed_reduction, size = 12), nudge_x = 0.2, nudge_y = 0.1, col = color_brew[3]) + 
  scale_y_continuous(limits=c(-8,0),breaks=seq(-8,0,1)) +
  scale_x_continuous(limits=c(-7,7),breaks=seq(-7,7,1)) +
  geom_hline(yintercept = 0) +
  geom_vline(xintercept = 0) +
  ylab("Cost Difference [Mio. EUR]") + xlab("QALY Difference") +
  settings$ggplot_theme +
  theme(legend.position = "none")

ggplot(scen_analysis$ETRANACOGENE_max_bleed_reduction_duration$model_results, aes(x = ETRANACOGENE_PROPHYLAXIS_inc_QALY , y = ETRANACOGENE_PROPHYLAXIS_inc_Costs/1000000)) +

#===============================================================================
# Prices
#==============================================================================

ggplot(scen_analysis$price_ETRANACOGENE$model_results, aes(y = ETRANACOGENE_PROPHYLAXIS_INMB/1000000 , x = scen_analysis$price_ETRANACOGENE$range/1000000)) +
   geom_vline(xintercept = scen_analysis$base_case$model_results$price_ETRANACOGENE/1000000,
             color = "grey", linetype="dashed") +
  annotate("text", 
           x= scen_analysis$base_case$model_results$price_ETRANACOGENE/1000000 + 0.05, 
           y= -2.3, 
           label= "Base case price", 
           angle= 90, size = 5, color = "grey") +
  geom_point()+
  geom_line()+
  geom_text(aes(label=format(price_ETRANACOGENE/1000000, big.mark = ",", scientific = FALSE), size = 12), nudge_x = 0.1, nudge_y = 0.85, check_overlap = TRUE, col = color_brew[2]) + 
  scale_y_continuous(limits=c(-4,4),breaks=seq(-4,4,1)) +
  scale_x_continuous(limits=c(0,3.5),breaks=seq(0,3.5,0.5)) +
  geom_hline(yintercept = 0) +
  geom_vline(xintercept = 0) +
  ylab("Incremental NMB [Mio. EUR]") + xlab("Price etranacogene dezaparvovec [Mio. EUR]") +
  settings$ggplot_theme +
  theme(legend.position = "none")

# price of coagulation factor

# Scenario 7 days bleed disutility

columns <- c("Treatment",
             "Baseline QALYs", "Baseline total costs", "Baseline INMB",
             "Scenario QALYs", "Scenario total costs", "Scenario INMB")

scenario_table_bleed_disutility <- setNames(data.frame(matrix(data = 0,
                                                       nrow = 2,
                                                       ncol = length(columns))), 
                                                              columns)

scenario_table_bleed_disutility[,"Treatment"] <- c("ETRANACOGENE",  "Prophylaxis")

scenario_table_bleed_disutility[1,"Baseline QALYs"]                   <- scen_analysis[["base_case"]][["model_results"]]["ETRANACOGENE_QALYs_disc"][1,]
scenario_table_bleed_disutility[2,"Baseline QALYs"]                   <- scen_analysis[["base_case"]][["model_results"]]["PROPHYLAXIS_QALYs_disc"][1,]

scenario_table_bleed_disutility[1,"Baseline total costs"]             <- scen_analysis[["base_case"]][["model_results"]]["ETRANACOGENE_cost_disc"][1,]
scenario_table_bleed_disutility[2,"Baseline total costs"]             <- scen_analysis[["base_case"]][["model_results"]]["PROPHYLAXIS_cost_disc"][1,]

scenario_table_bleed_disutility[2,"Baseline INMB"]                    <- scen_analysis[["base_case"]][["model_results"]][["ETRANACOGENE_PROPHYLAXIS_INMB"]][1]

scenario_table_bleed_disutility[1,"Scenario QALYs"]                   <- scen_analysis[["scen_bleed_disutility"]][["model_results"]]["ETRANACOGENE_QALYs_disc"][1,]
scenario_table_bleed_disutility[2,"Scenario QALYs"]                   <- scen_analysis[["scen_bleed_disutility"]][["model_results"]]["PROPHYLAXIS_QALYs_disc"][1,]

scenario_table_bleed_disutility[1,"Scenario total costs"]             <- scen_analysis[["scen_bleed_disutility"]][["model_results"]]["ETRANACOGENE_cost_disc"][1,]
scenario_table_bleed_disutility[2,"Scenario total costs"]             <- scen_analysis[["scen_bleed_disutility"]][["model_results"]]["PROPHYLAXIS_cost_disc"][1,]

scenario_table_bleed_disutility[2,"Scenario INMB"]                    <- scen_analysis[["scen_bleed_disutility"]][["model_results"]][["ETRANACOGENE_PROPHYLAXIS_INMB"]][1]

pandoc.table(scenario_table_bleed_disutility, "Comparison 1 day vs 7 day bleed disutility", style = 'rmarkdown')

# Comparison Table

columns <- c("Scenario",
             "Incremental QALYs", "Incremental Costs [EUR]", "INMB [EUR]")

scenario_table_comparison <- setNames(data.frame(matrix(data = 0,
                                                       nrow = 9,
                                                       ncol = length(columns))), 
                                                              columns)

scenario_table_comparison[,"Scenario"] <- c("Base case", 
                                            "Scenario 1: 7 day bleed disutility",
                                            "Scenario 2: 5x costs per day in ICU",
                                            "Scenario 3: No treatment switching",
                                            "Scenario 4: No vial sharing",
                                            "Scenario 5: Cost-minimization",
                                            "Scenario 6: Age 18",
                                            "Scenario 7: Age 60",
                                            "Scenario 8: German utilities")

scenario_table_comparison[1,"Incremental QALYs"] <- scenario_table_bleed_disutility[1,"Baseline QALYs"] - scenario_table_bleed_disutility[2,"Baseline QALYs"]

scenario_table_comparison[2,"Incremental QALYs"] <- scenario_table_bleed_disutility[1,"Scenario QALYs"] - scenario_table_bleed_disutility[2,"Scenario QALYs"]

scenario_table_comparison[3,"Incremental QALYs"] <- scenario_table_high_price_hosp[1,"Scenario QALYs"] - scenario_table_high_price_hosp[2,"Scenario QALYs"]

scenario_table_comparison[4,"Incremental QALYs"] <- scenario_table_ETRANACOGENE_no_switch[1,"Scenario QALYs"] - scenario_table_ETRANACOGENE_no_switch[2,"Scenario QALYs"]

scenario_table_comparison[5,"Incremental QALYs"] <- scenario_table_no_vial_sharing[1,"Scenario QALYs"] - scenario_table_no_vial_sharing[2,"Scenario QALYs"]

# For the cost-minimization scenario we simply use baseline values
scenario_table_comparison[6,"Incremental QALYs"] <- scenario_table_bleed_disutility[1,"Baseline QALYs"] - scenario_table_bleed_disutility[2,"Baseline QALYs"]

scenario_table_comparison[7,"Incremental QALYs"] <- scenario_table_age_18[1,"Scenario QALYs"] - scenario_table_age_18[2,"Scenario QALYs"]

scenario_table_comparison[8,"Incremental QALYs"] <- scenario_table_age_60[1,"Scenario QALYs"] - scenario_table_age_60[2,"Scenario QALYs"]

scenario_table_comparison[9,"Incremental QALYs"] <- scenario_table_util_german[1,"Scenario QALYs"] - scenario_table_util_german[2,"Scenario QALYs"]

### 

scenario_table_comparison[1,"Incremental Costs [EUR]"] <- scenario_table_bleed_disutility[1,"Baseline total costs"] - scenario_table_bleed_disutility[2,"Baseline total costs"]

scenario_table_comparison[2,"Incremental Costs [EUR]"] <- scenario_table_bleed_disutility[1,"Scenario total costs"] - scenario_table_bleed_disutility[2,"Scenario total costs"]

scenario_table_comparison[3,"Incremental Costs [EUR]"] <- scenario_table_high_price_hosp[1,"Scenario total costs"] - scenario_table_high_price_hosp[2,"Scenario total costs"]

scenario_table_comparison[4,"Incremental Costs [EUR]"] <- scenario_table_ETRANACOGENE_no_switch[1,"Scenario total costs"] - scenario_table_ETRANACOGENE_no_switch[2,"Scenario total costs"]
  
scenario_table_comparison[5,"Incremental Costs [EUR]"] <- scenario_table_no_vial_sharing[1,"Scenario total costs"] - scenario_table_no_vial_sharing[2,"Scenario total costs"]

# For the cost-minimization scenario we simply use baseline values
scenario_table_comparison[6,"Incremental Costs [EUR]"] <- scenario_table_bleed_disutility[1,"Baseline total costs"] - scenario_table_bleed_disutility[2,"Baseline total costs"]
  
scenario_table_comparison[7,"Incremental Costs [EUR]"] <- scenario_table_age_18[1,"Scenario total costs"] - scenario_table_age_18[2,"Scenario total costs"]
  
scenario_table_comparison[8,"Incremental Costs [EUR]"] <- scenario_table_age_60[1,"Scenario total costs"] - scenario_table_age_60[2,"Scenario total costs"]

scenario_table_comparison[9,"Incremental Costs [EUR]"] <- scenario_table_util_german[1,"Scenario total costs"] - scenario_table_util_german[2,"Scenario total costs"]

###

scenario_table_comparison[1,"INMB [EUR]"] <- scenario_table_bleed_disutility[2,"Baseline INMB"]
scenario_table_comparison[2,"INMB [EUR]"] <- scenario_table_bleed_disutility[2,"Scenario INMB"]
scenario_table_comparison[3,"INMB [EUR]"] <- scenario_table_high_price_hosp[2,"Scenario INMB"]
scenario_table_comparison[4,"INMB [EUR]"] <- scenario_table_ETRANACOGENE_no_switch[2,"Scenario INMB"]
scenario_table_comparison[5,"INMB [EUR]"] <- scenario_table_no_vial_sharing[2,"Scenario INMB"]
# For the cost-minimization scenario, negative incremental costs are equal to INMB
scenario_table_comparison[6,"INMB [EUR]"] <- -scenario_table_comparison[6,"Incremental Costs [EUR]"]
scenario_table_comparison[7,"INMB [EUR]"] <- scenario_table_age_18[2,"Scenario INMB"]
scenario_table_comparison[8,"INMB [EUR]"] <- scenario_table_age_60[2,"Scenario INMB"]
scenario_table_comparison[9,"INMB [EUR]"] <- scenario_table_util_german[2,"Scenario INMB"]

pandoc.table(scenario_table_comparison, "Comparison base case no vial sharing", style = 'rmarkdown')
```
